quote.author: John Dewey:
quote.text: Education is not preparation for life; education is life itself. It is the continuous reconstruction of experience, where each lesson learned becomes the foundation for new growth, and every challenge faced an opportunity for deeper wisdom.

subscription.title: Find Your Perfect Learning Path
subscription.description: From basic scholarship search to AI-powered matching, choose the plan that fits your academic goals. Get personalized recommendations and connect with opportunities worldwide.

benefit_1.desc: Easily find and track scholarships with deadline reminders.

benefit_2.title: Connect Directly
benefit_2.desc: Message professors & scholarship officers to boost your chances.

benefit_3.title: Get Smart Matches
benefit_3.desc: Use AI to find the best-fit scholarships and research groups.

subscription.title: Find Your Perfect Learning Path
subscription.description: From basic scholarship search to AI-powered matching, choose the plan that fits your academic goals. Get personalized recommendations and connect with opportunities worldwide.

benefit_1.title: Save Time & Stay Organized
benefit_1.desc: Easily find and track scholarships with deadline reminders.

benefit_2.title: Connect Directly
benefit_2.desc: Message professors & scholarship officers to boost your chances.

benefit_3.title: Get Smart Matches
benefit_3.desc: Use AI to find the best-fit scholarships and research groups.

hero_section.title: Match. Apply. Succeed.
hero_section.subtitle: Find your perfect opportunity match with our intelligent matching system

about_section.title: Your Gateway to Study Abroad, Global Research & Scholarship Opportunities
about_section.description: At EduMatch, we bring students closer to graduate research programs and scholarships worldwide, ensuring a perfect fit with our intelligent matching system. Explore opportunities that align with your academic background and aspirations.

features_1.title: Smart Matching
features_1.description: Match students with the right programs based on qualifications.

features_2.title: Global Opportunities
features_2.description: Access scholarships and research programs globally.

features_3.title: Personalized Recommendations
features_3.description: Find opportunities tailored to your specific academic background.

features_4.title: Seamless Application Process
features_4.description: Apply with ease through our platform's intuitive interface.

cta_section.title: Explore Programmes, Research and Scholarship Opportunities Today
cta_section.description_1: Join EduMatch now to start your journey to success.
cta_section.description_2: Find the perfect opportunities for you.

hero.title: Choose the plan that's right for you
hero.description: Select a plan that fits your scholarship hunting needs. From basic search to AI-powered matching, we've got you covered.

free.name: Free Plan
free.description: Ideal for applicants ready to apply and track progress.
features: Create & update personal profile (GPA, skills, research topic, etc.)
Basic scholarship, program & research group search
Receive deadline reminders for saved scholarships/programs
Send messages to scholarship staff / professors

standard.name: Standard Membership
standard.description: Perfect for active scholarship hunters and applicants.

premium.name: Premium Membership
premium.description: Ultimate package for serious academic pursuers.

active_subscription.title: You Already Have an Active Subscription
active_subscription.current_plan: You currently have an active {plan} subscription.
active_subscription.need_cancel: To subscribe to the {newPlan} plan, you need to cancel your current subscription first.
active_subscription.access_note: You'll retain access to your current plan until the end of your billing period.

cancel_confirmation.title: Cancel Subscription
cancel_confirmation.confirm_question: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription?
cancel_confirmation.current_plan: You currently have an active {plan} subscription.
cancel_confirmation.access_note: You'll retain access to your current plan until the end of your billing period.
cancel_confirmation.warning: This action cannot be undone. You'll need to resubscribe to regain access.

comparison.title: Compare Plans
comparison.description: Choose the plan that best fits your scholarship hunting needs and budget.
features: Create & update personal profile (GPA, skills, research topic, etc.)
Basic scholarship, program & research group search
Receive deadline reminders for saved scholarships/programs
Send messages to scholarship staff / professors
See matching score for scholarships / research groups
Search scholarships with natural language input

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s

questions.question: What is included in the Free Plan?
questions.answer: The Free Plan includes basic account registration, profile creation, scholarship search, and viewing details. Perfect for getting started with EduMatch.

questions.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan anytime?
questions.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes will be reflected in your next billing cycle.

questions.question: What makes the Premium Plan worth it?
questions.answer: The Premium Plan includes advanced AI matching, unlimited applications, natural language search, and priority customer support for serious scholarship hunters.

questions.question: Do you offer refunds?
questions.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for all paid plans. If you are not satisfied, contact our support team for a full refund.
